item.title: Crea tu Libro de Autor para Arquitectos e Interioristas
item.description:
Crea tu Libro de Autor para Arquitectos e Interioristas Crear tu Libro de Autor de tus Diseños, Obras y Proyectos de Arquitectura e Interiorismo Instructores: Arquitecto Álvaro García y Arquitecta Lucía Fernández. Contenido Actualizado: Octubre 2021 Calificación: ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐
Descripción del Curso: Hola, Somos Álvaro García y Lucía Fernández, arquitectos desde hace más de 15 años. Hemos realizando obras, proyectos y reformas de interior y queremos compartir contigo esta formación donde podrás hacer una auto publicación o edición de tu libro de autor, que consiste en la publicación de tu libro porfolio con tus proyectos de arquitectura, interiorismo y creatividad sin la intervención de un editor.

item.title: Branding & Brand Management: Branding Strategy Brand Tactics
item.description: Top MBAs are expensive, time-consuming, and extremely difficult to get into. My goal with this course is to give you an MBA level of understanding branding and brand management. Learn from a former Global Brand Manager at Sony PlayStation who studied brand management at the Kellogg School of Management and has helped countless startups with their branding. If you sell marketing services, this gives you a sophisticated edge over other marketers.

item.title: Personal Branding: Personal Brand Building | Fame & Success!
item.description: This is the definitive course on personal branding. My name is Dekker Fraser and I was a Global Brand Manager for Sony PlayStation. I have over 100,000 students on Udemy and I was a VP of Marketing for a Google accelerator startup. I was a college marketing instructor, and I studied brand management at the #1 business school for marketing. This is where the father of marketing himself, Philip Kotler, teaches.
